entry.title: Markus and Rosa in Norway for the Biosystematikk-meeting

link.title: Markus and Rosa in Norway for the Biosystematikk-meeting

entry.content: Markus and Rosa went to Trondheim, for the “Norsk Symposium i Biosystematikk”. Markus gave the keynote lecture on our recent findings of inheritance in basidiomycetes and Rosa gave a shorter talk on the microbiome associated with the fairy ring forming Marasmius oreades. Rosa won a price for her talk!

entry.title: New positions at the Johannesson lab

link.title: New positions at the Johannesson lab

entry.content:
We have several open positions in my group, funded from the ERC Advanced Grant ”FUNGERM” - on the Early Sequestered Germline of Fungi. We will recruit PhD-students, postdoc(s) and a research engineer. We search broadly for applicants with a dedicated interest in fungal evolutionary biology, and are in particular encouraging applicants with a background in molecular biology and microscopy to apply.

Find the positions here: https://su.varbi.com/

  • PhD student in Fungal Evolutionary Biology: SU FV-3100-25
  • PhD student in Fungal Biology: SU FV-3102-25
  • Postdoc: SU FV-3097-25
  • Research engineer: SU FV-3098-25

entry.title: Our germline paper published in Science

link.title: Our germline paper published in Science

entry.content: In this paper, published today in Science, we outline how we made use of the fairy-ring forming mushroom, Marasmius oreades, to show that early germline sequestration takes place in fungi, too!
